actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to strengthen State enforcement of railroad safety laws.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to grant State concurrent authority together with the Secretary of Transportation to enforce the provisions of such Art or the Federal regulations promulgated pursuant to such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to strengthen State enforcement of railroad safety laws.
